rooms.name: Entrance Hall / Lobby
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall that serves as an initial impression and transition area. Features floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Modern living room with large floor-to-ceiling windows to let in plenty of sunlight and provide an open view. Vastu aligned east-facing window for energy.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with a semi-open design; features a wall of glass facing north-west as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen integrated with dining area; designed to be wheelchair accessible with lower countertops and space for movement.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Accessible guest bathroom including grab bars and lowered fixtures as per ADA compliance. Strategically placed near main living areas.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom (Level 1, Ground Floor)
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, located in a quiet section of the house. Includes wheelchair-accessible features and floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom (Level 1, Ground Floor)
rooms.description: Functional bedroom with ample space; designed to be wheelchair accessible. Features a private window facing east for positive energy.

rooms.name: Third Bedroom (Level 1, Ground Floor)
rooms.description: Smaller bedroom option; includes floor-to-ceiling windows to let in ample light. Vastu principles applied with south-east orientation.

rooms.name: Utility Room / Service Area
rooms.description: Dedicated service area for maintenance and storage of cleaning supplies; designed to be wheelchair accessible.

openings.description: Accessible entrance with a ramp. Ensures smooth entry for wheelchair users and complies with ADA standards.
Floor-to-ceiling windows present in living areas and bedrooms to maximize natural light. Strategically placed per Vastu for energy flow.
Provides a view of the swimming pool and landscaped garden. Includes accessible ramp access from indoors.
Outdoor swimming pool area with a designated wheelchair-accessible pathway and safety rails.

accessibility_features.description: Gentle ramps integrated into main entrance to ensure easy access for wheelchair users.
All doorways and corridors are designed with sufficient width (at least 36 inches) to accommodate wheelchair movement.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: Compact living space for the staff, designed with a functional layout and equipped with essential amenities. Vastu aligned by east-west axis.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom (Level 2)
rooms.description: Functional bedroom designed to be wheelchair accessible; includes ample natural light via floor-to-ceiling windows.

openings.description: Elevated staircase with an adjacent ramp option to ensure full accessibility between levels.

accessibility_features.description: A dedicated elevator or lift is integrated into the plan to allow wheelchair movement between floors in compliance with ADA standards.
Stairs are designed with handrails and a landing area for safety and ease of use.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom (Second Floor)
rooms.description: Spacious bathroom designed with accessibility in mind; features grab bars and a roll-in shower.

rooms.name: Storage Loft
rooms.description: Additional storage space above the living area, accessible by a separate staircase or ramp.

openings.description: Designated emergency exit with clear signage and accessible route for evacuation.
